nz.govt.natlib
Class Configurator

java.lang.Object
  nz.govt.natlib.Configurator

public class Configurator
extends java.lang.Object

This class performs some checks to try and make sure that the tool is configured correctly.

Author:
bbeaumont

static boolean check()
          Check if the tool is configured, but do not try to configure it if it isn't.

Configurator

public Configurator()
Method Detail

install

public static void install(boolean hasUi)
Attempts to update the configuration XML based on the metahome property.

Parameters:
hasUi - true if there is a user interface. If false, responses will only be written to the command line.

close

public static void close(java.io.Reader r)
Close a reader, consuming all exceptions. Very useful in finally blocks.

Parameters:
r - The reader to close.

close

public static void close(java.io.Writer w)
Close a writer, consuming all exceptions. Very useful in finally blocks.

Parameters:
w - The writer to close.

getMetaHome

public static java.lang.String getMetaHome()
Retrieve the metahome directory, removing the trailing slash if one is present.

Returns:
The metadata home directory.

getLockFile

public static java.io.File getLockFile()
Get the file used to quickly detect if we've configured the tool already.

Returns:
The file.

check

public static boolean check()
Check if the tool is configured, but do not try to configure it if it isn't.

Returns:
true if already configured.
